column3: In commit "Return a bool in SpendCoin to restore pre-per-utxo assert semantics"\n\nMaybe drop hungarian.

In commit "Restore some assert semantics in sigop cost calculations"\n\nMaybe update commit message to suggest why policy/atmp asserts aren't added back. Not possible there, or just not worth the effort?

I figured it wasn't worth it - if we hit those errors in consensus code, we'd better crash cause we might fall out of consensus...if we accidentally add something to our mempool that should be out of policy...oh well, not a big deal.  (I updated commit message).
